content.rendered:
Sloan and Drew's spring wedding at The Bell Tower was whimsical and romantic with a modern edge.

The couple was inspired by Restoration Hardware and wanted to perfectly juxtapose similar modern, structured elements with classic romance and softness. We brought this vision to life by highlighting the historic charm of The Bell Tower. Glamorous mercury vases held sweet arrangements in varying shades of pink by Forget Me Not Designs, and twinkling string lights were strung from the beams to create ambiance.

The ceremony took place underneath a custom-made floral chandelier. It was the result of a beautiful collaboration between Ashley Walters of Forget Me Not Designs and our production design team.

Each guest took home a personalized CD from the newlyweds - but not before grabbing a scrumptious slice of cake by Dulce Desserts!

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: March 21, 2015
Bride & Groom: Sloan and Drew
Location: The Bell Tower
Photographer: Nyk & Cali
Cake: Dulce Desserts
Florist: Forget Me Not Designs
DJ: DJ Mindub
Paper Goods: Green Bean Paper Co.
Catering: The Bell Tower
Production Design: Infinity Hospitality
Planning: Lesa | IH

excerpt.rendered: Restoration Hardware meets classic romance at The Bell Tower.
